bill.summary:
Preserving Access to Rural Installment Transactions for Years Act of 2018 or the PARITY Act of 2018
This bill amends the Truth in Lending Act to revise the definition of a mortgage originator for the purposes of compliance with registration, compensation, and other requirements under that Act.
